title: "Choosing the Right Tractor Size for Your Farm: The Ultimate Guide"

tasks.task: Choosing the right tractor size for a farm
subtasks: Considering the size of the farm
Assessing the type of crops grown
Determining the specific tasks to be performed
Evaluating the power requirements for each task
Considering future expansion and changing needs

tasks.task: Citing real-world examples of successful tractor size choices
subtasks: Sarah's 45-horsepower tractor for a 30-acre vegetable farm
Mike's 120-horsepower tractor for a 200-acre corn and soybean operation
The Johnson family's two-tractor setup for 500 acres of mixed crops
